source/include/boost/config/platform/bsd.hpp

00007 
00008 //  See http://www.boost.org for most recent version.
00009 
00010 //  generic BSD config options:
00011 
00012 #if !defined(__FreeBSD__) && !defined(__NetBSD__) && !defined(__OpenBSD__)
00013 #error "This platform is not BSD"
00014 #endif
00015 
00016 #ifdef __FreeBSD__
00017 #define BOOST_PLATFORM "FreeBSD " BOOST_STRINGIZE(__FreeBSD__)
00018 #elif defined(__NetBSD__)
00019 #define BOOST_PLATFORM "NetBSD " BOOST_STRINGIZE(__NetBSD__)
00020 #elif defined(__OpenBSD__)
00021 #define BOOST_PLATFORM "OpenBSD " BOOST_STRINGIZE(__OpenBSD__)
00022 #endif
00023 
00024 //
00025 // is this the correct version check?
00026 // FreeBSD has <nl_types.h> but does not
00027 // advertise the fact in <unistd.h>:
00028 //
00029 #if defined(__FreeBSD__) && (__FreeBSD__ >= 3)
00030 #  define BOOST_HAS_NL_TYPES_H
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 //
00034 // FreeBSD 3.x has pthreads support, but defines _POSIX_THREADS in <pthread.h>
00035 // and not in <unistd.h>
00036 //
00037 #if defined(__FreeBSD__) && (__FreeBSD__ <= 3)
00038 #  define BOOST_HAS_PTHREADS
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 //
00042 // No wide character support in the BSD header files:
00043 //
00044 #define BOOST_NO_CWCHAR
00045 
00046 //
00047 // The BSD <ctype.h> has macros only, no functions:
00048 //
00049 #define BOOST_NO_CTYPE_FUNCTIONS
00050 
00051 //
00052 // thread API's not auto detected:
00053 //
00054 #define BOOST_HAS_SCHED_YIELD
00055 #define BOOST_HAS_NANOSLEEP
00056 #define BOOST_HAS_GETTIMEOFDAY
00057 #define BOOST_HAS_PTHREAD_MUTEXATTR_SETTYPE
00058 #define BOOST_HAS_SIGACTION
00059 
00060 // boilerplate code:
00061 #define BOOST_HAS_UNISTD_H
00062 #include <boost/config/posix_features.hpp>
00063 
00064
